value.name: Murder of William Butler - Wikipedia
value.snippet: The murder of William Butler was an early example of a school shooting in Louisville, Kentucky in 1853. [1] [2] Background [ edit] William Butler was a 28 year old teacher, a Yankee from Indiana who came to Louisville and founded the Louisville School, attracting pupils from the wealthy families. [1] As a teacher he was strict about discipline.

value.name: British Executions - Thomas Clements (William Butler) - 1910
value.snippet: William Butler Age: 62 Sex: male Crime: murder Date Of Execution: 24 Mar 1910 Crime Location: Tank Cottage, Bassaleg, Newport Execution Place: Usk Method: hanging Executioner: Henry Pierrepoint Source: http://discovery.nationalarchives.co.uk William Butler was convicted of the murder of Charles Thomas 82 and Mary Thomas 72 and sentenced to death.

value.name: British Executions - William Allen Butler - 1916
value.snippet: William Butler murdered Florence Beatrice Butler 29 who he stabbed to death at 2 Bath Terrace, Chequers Walk, Birmingham on 20 May 1916. They had been dating but William Butler had started to beat Florence Butler and William Butler who was lodging in the house was asked to leave.

value.name: William Butler (actor) - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Butler is known for playing characters who are killed off in many of the horror films that he has appeared in. He has starred in Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood as Michael, Night of the Living Dead as Tom, Leatherface: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre III as Ryan, and as Ben in two episodes of the television show Freddy's Nightmares.

value.name: William Thomas Butler | Murderpedia, the encyclopedia of murderers
value.snippet: William Thomas Butler When the body of Ernest Percival Key was discovered in his shop just before midday on Saturday 24th December 1938 it was covered in blood. The 64-year-old victim had been stabbed more than thirty times in his head and face and there were more wounds to his arms. He died before he could reach hospital. Murder-UK.com

value.name: Two arrested in connection with the murder of William Butler
value.snippet: Mar 04, 2021 Two arrests have been made in connection with last month’s beating death of 69-year-old William Butler Jr. He was found dead in his living room by his wife when she returned home from church the evening of Feb. 10, according to a Georgetown County Sheriff’s Office incident report.

value.name: The Strange Case of the William Marsh Rice Murder
value.snippet: William Marsh Rice, who made his fortune in Houston, and was murdered for that money. Image: Fair Use William Marsh Rice moved to Houston from Massachusetts in 1838, not long after the Allen...

value.name: Georgetown Sheriff's Office Arrest Two for Murder of Andrews Man
value.snippet: “Family members of William Butler Jr. arrived home from church to find their house had been broken into and their loved one brutally killed. Multiple firearms along with jewelry and other items had been stolen,” said Georgetown County Sheriff Carter Weaver. “The victim’s red Chevrolet S-10 was also stolen from the residence.
